column2: Let's hope so!

column2: The meeting with [From.GetTitledName] at [From.Capital.GetName] went well...so well, in fact, that by the end of it you were all but certain that [From.GetSheHe] would soon be joining your faction.
column6: La reunion con [From.GetTitledName] en [From.Capital.GetName] fue bien... tan bien, que de hecho, al final estabas convencido de que [From.GetElElla] se uniria pronto a tu faccion.

column2: You've heard talk recently that [From.GetTitledName] will soon be leaving your faction. If so, it is almost certainly the result of a recent meeting between [From.GetHerHim] and [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]. [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has been engaged in some poaching, it seems.
column6: Ha llegado a tus oidos que [From.GetTitledName] abandonara pronto tu faccion. De ser asi, es casi seguro que sea por la reciente reunion entre [From.GetElElla] y [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]. [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] ha estado involucrado en captacion de miembros...

column2: How dare [FromFromFrom.GetSheHe]!
column6: ¡Como se atreve!

column2: The meeting with [From.GetTitledName] at [From.Capital.GetName] went well enough, and you managed to leave on a good note, though [From.GetSheHe] made no promises about joining your faction.
column6: La reunion con [From.GetTitledName] en [From.Capital.GetName] fue bien, y lograste irte dejando una buena impresion, aunque [From.GetElElla] no hizo promesas de unirse a tu faccion.

column2: Well, it's at least a start
column6: Bueno, al menos es un inicio

column2: Unfortunately, [From.GetTitledName] refused to speak with you more than briefly, and utterly refused to engage in any discussion about your faction. The attempted meeting was a complete waste.
column6: Desgraciadamente, [From.GetTitledName] se negó a hablar contigo mas que un instante, y se negó por completo a entrar a debatir sobre tu faccion. El intento de reunion fue una perdida de tiempo.

column2: Unfortunately, [From.GetTitledName] refused to speak with you more than briefly, and utterly refused to engage in any discussion about your faction. What's more, you're certain that [From.GetSheHe] informed [target_faction_leader.GetTitledName] of your attempted poaching.
column6: Desgraciadamente, [From.GetTitledName] se negó a hablar contigo mas que un instante, y se negó por completo a entrar a debatir sobre tu faccion. Y no solo eso, sino que encima estás seguro de que [From.GetElElla] ha informado a [target_faction_leader.GetTitledName] de tu intento de captacion.

column2:
My [Root.GetLordLady],
You should be aware that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] recently came to [From.Capital.GetName], attempting to persuade me to join [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] faction. I sent [FromFromFrom.GetHerHim] on [FromFromFrom.GetHerHis] way, and now inform you in case [FromFromFrom.GetSheHe] attempts to do the same elsewhere.

With respect,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi Señor[Root.GetXA],
Debes saber que [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] vino recientemente a [From.Capital.GetName], tratando de persuadirme de unirme a su faccion. Me despedi de [FromFromFrom.GetElElla], y ahora te informo en caso de que trate de hacer lo mismo en otro lugar.

Respetuosamente me despido,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2: [target_faction_dispute.GetTitledName] is clearly not fond of you, but recently relations between you and [target_faction_dispute.GetHerHim] have made a turn for the worse. A dispute over issues within your faction has become rancorous, and it is clearly becoming quite the scandal.
column6: [target_faction_dispute.GetTitledName] claramente no se lleva bien contigo, pero recientemente las relaciones entre tu y [target_faction_dispute.GetElElla] han ido a peor. Una disputa sobre asuntos de tu faccion se ha vuelto rencorosa, y esta claramente convirtiendose en un escandalo.

column2: So be it
column6: Que asi sea

column2: Try to talk things out with [target_faction_dispute.GetHerHim]

column6: Consigues una audiencia con [From.GetTitledName] en [From.Capital.GetName] para discutir asuntos de la Faccion de la Corte. Con un poco de suerte esto llevara a un mayor entendimiento entre los dos--suponiendo que no haya malentendidos.

column2: Let's hope things go well
column6: Esperemos que las cosas vayan bien

column2: You arrive at [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] and are greeted pleasantly, and after a fine dinner with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] the two of you get down to business. Your discussions go well, and when you leave the next day you're quite certain that you and [FromFrom.GetSheHe] have a greater understanding of where you both stand on issues.
column6: Llegas a [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] y eres bienvenido educadamente, y tras una buena cena con [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] os poneis a tratar el asunto de la reunion. Vuestra charla va bien, y cuando partes al dia siguiente estas bastante seguro de que tu y [FromFrom.GetElElla] teneis un mejor entendimiento de donde están vuestras posiciones.

column2: You arrive at [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] and are greeted pleasantly enough, though during the dinner with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] you can tell [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is suspicious of the reason for your visit--and, sure enough, the discussions you have seem to go nowhere. The trip, it seems, was pretty much a waste.
column6: Llegas a [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] y eres bienvenido formalmente, aunque durante la cena con [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] estás convencido de que [FromFrom.GetElElla] sospecha de la razon de tu visita--y, probablemente, las discusiones no llegaran a buen puerto. Parece que al visita, ha sido una perdida de tiempo.

column2: You arrive at [FromFrom.Capital.GetName], and things get off to a bad start almost immediately. You and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] bicker over trivialities all through dinner, and by the time faction business is discussed it seems as if your presence does more harm than good. You are relieved to finally leave the next morning.
column6: Llegas a [FromFrom.Capital.GetName], y las cosas empiezan mal casi de inmediato. Tu y [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] discutis sobre trivialidades durante toda la cena, para cuando empezais a debatir sobre los asuntos de la faccion parece que tu presencia hace mas mal que bien. Te sientes aliviado de partir a la mañana siguiente.

column2: You arrange an audience with [From.GetTitledName], hoping to convince [From.GetHerHim] of your rightful claim to the [target_claimed_title.GetFullName]. With any luck, [From.GetTitledFirstName] will be open to your arguments.

column2: Let's hope this goes well

column2: After listening to your arguments for some time, and with a great deal of discussion, you walk away feeling that [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is now much more inclined to favor your claim. Whether that will result in [FromFrom.GetHerHim] joining your faction remains to be seen.
column6: Tras escuchar tus argumentos durante un rato, y con una buena discusion, te vas sintiendo que [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] está mucho mas inclinado a favorecer tu reclamacion. Que de ello resulte su union a tu faccion está por verse.

column6: Tras escuchar tus argumentos durante un rato, y con una buena discusion, te vas sintiendo que [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] está mucho mas inclinado a favorecer la reclamacion de [target_claimant.GetTitledFirstName]. Que de ello resulte su union a tu faccion está por verse.

column2: After listening to your arguments for some time, and with a great deal of discussion, you walk away feeling as if you've hardly moved [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] at all. The [FromFrom.GetManWoman] made no promises of support and gave no indication of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] true feelings on the issue.
column6: Tras escuchar tus argumentos durante un rato, y con una buena discusion, te vas sintiendo como si apenas hubieses influido a [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].[FromFrom.GetElElla] no hizo promesas de apoyo ni parecio indicar sus verdaderos sentimientos sobre el asunto.

column2: Your meeting with [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] could hardly have gone worse. You barely discussed the claim at all, instead getting caught up in old arguments and discussions of feudal obligation. You leave [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] believing it would have been better not to have come at all.
column6: Tu reunion con [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] dificilmente podria haber ido peor. Apenas discutisteis la reclamacion, en lugar de ello, os visteis envueltos en debates sobre las obligaciones feudales. Dejas [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] creyendo que habria sido mejor no haber ido.

column2:
My liege,
I have discovered an opportunity which might allow you to secretly undermine [faction_member.GetTitledName]'s standing with the rest of the Court Faction. Indeed, if you wish, we could also threaten [faction_member.GetHerHim] with it directly and force [faction_member.GetHerHim] from the faction. It is a risk, so I will leave the decision in your hands.

Sincerely,
[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi Señor,
He descubierto una oportunidad para poder menoscabar en secreto la posicion de [faction_member.GetTitledName] con el resto de la Faccion de la Corte. Si asi lo deseas, podriamos amenazarle directamente y obligarle a abandonar la faccion. Tiene sus riesgos, asi que dejo la decision en tus sabias manos.

Siempre a tu servicio,
[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledName]

column2:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
[From.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] has uncovered some information about your activities which the other lords in your faction would hardly appreciate. It's in your best interest to leave your faction at once, lest they learn the truth.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
[From.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] ha descubierto informacion sobre tus actividades que los otros nobles de tu faccion dificilmente podrian apreciar. Te conviene abandonar tu faccion inmediatamente, no sea que conozcan la verdad.

Un cordial saludo,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2: What could [From.GetSheHe] know?? I should do as [From.GetSheHe] says!
column6: ¿¿Que sabrá?? ¡Debo hacer lo que dice!

column2: It is a bluff -- tell [From.GetHerHim] to do [From.GetHerHis] worst
column6: Es un farol -- dile que haga lo que quiera

column2:
My liege,
I am left to wonder what this 'information' is that you claim to have, and feel it must be a misunderstanding. Nevertheless, I shall do as you demand and withdraw from my faction for a time.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi Señor,
   Me pregunto qué será "información" que afirmas tener y considero que debe ser un malentendido. En cualquier caso, hare como ordenas y abandonare mi faccion durante un tiempo.

Saludos cordiales,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2: My liege,\nI can only wonder what it is you think you know. I call your bluff. Tell my faction whatever you wish
column3:
I think they will believe me over you.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
column7: Mi Señor,\n Me pregunto que es eso que crees saber. Estoy seguro de que es un farol. Dile a mi faccion lo que desees
column8:
Creo que me creeran a mi antes que a ti.

Un cordial Saludo,
[From.GetTitledName]

column2: Let us press forward, then

column2: Let's drop this before it gets worse

column2: The attempt to undermine [faction_member.GetTitledFirstName] did nothing. [faction_member.GetHerHisCap] faction members heard the allegations, but believed [faction_member.GetHerHis] denials and the matter was completely dropped. Thankfully, no one knows of your involvement.
column6: El intento de menoscabar a [faction_member.GetTitledFirstName] no tuvo exito. Sus miembros de faccion escucharon las alegaciones, pero creyeron sus excusas y el asunto fue olvidado. Gracias a Dios, nadie sabe de tu implicacion.

column2: The attempt to undermine [faction_member.GetTitledFirstName] failed. [faction_member.GetHerHisCap] faction members heard the allegations, but believed [faction_member.GetHerHis] denials and the matter was dropped. Worse, they are all furious at you for making the allegations to begin with.

column2:
My liege,
My meeting with the faction did not go well. Try as I might, their anger was simply too great, and everything I said made them feel as if I was trying to trick them. I believe I may have made things worse.

My apologies,
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi Señor,

Mis disculpas,
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledName]

column2: After I yet again failed to assemble the faction for a meeting, the other members have decided that I am unfit for leadership and have chosen a new leader.

column2: Sadly, events have conspired that it is of course no longer possible for you to hold the faction meeting. It has been delayed for the time being.
column6: Lamentablemente, los acontecimientos han transcurrido de forma que, ya no sea posible celebrar la reunión de la Faccion. Se ha retrasado por el momento.

column2: So be it

column2: Damn this civil war!

column2: What we need are more faction members

column2: One by one, the Lords and Ladies of the faction assemble at my residence in [Root.Capital.GetName]. It is quite clear that the prevailing mood is that of fondness towards [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] and that things are going well in [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. As faction leader, it is up to me to address them and determine the agenda for the meeting to come.
column6: Uno a uno, los Señores de la Faccion se reunen en mi residencia en [Root.Capital.GetName]. Está bastante claro que el estado de animo que prevalece es simpatia hacia [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] y que las cosas van bien en [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Como lider de faccion, es mi deber analizar la situacion y determinar la agenda que debatiremos en la reunion que viene.

column2: One by one, in order of prestige and rank, the Lords and Ladies of the faction assemble at my residence in [Root.Capital.GetName]. The prevailing mood towards [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is mixed but not hostile, and thus it is clear that they expect me as the faction leader to set the agenda for the coming meeting.
column6: Uno a uno, los Señores de la Faccion se reunen en mi residencia en [Root.Capital.GetName]. El estado de animo que prevalece es variado hacia [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] aunque no hostil. Como lider de faccion, es mi deber analizar la situacion y determinar la agenda que debatiremos en la reunion que viene.

column2: One by one, the Lords and Ladies of the faction assemble at my residence in [Root.Capital.GetName]. It is quite clear that everyone is displeased with how things are going in [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], and much of it is blamed on [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. As faction leader, I am expected to address them and set the agenda for the coming meeting.
column6: Uno a uno, los Señores de la Faccion se reunen en mi residencia en [Root.Capital.GetName]. Está bastante claro que todos estan descontentos con el estado de las cosas en [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], y gran parte de la culpa la tiene [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. Como lider de faccion, es mi deber analizar la situacion y determinar la agenda que debatiremos en la reunion que viene.

column2: One by one, the Lords and Ladies of the faction assemble at my residence in [Root.Capital.GetName]. It is immediately clear what is on everyone's mind: their common enmity towards [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]. Already arguments have started over what to do, and thus they turn to me as faction leader to take charge of the situation and set the coming agenda.
column6: Uno a uno, los Señores de la Faccion se reunen en mi residencia en [Root.Capital.GetName]. Como lider de faccion, es mi deber analizar la situacion y determinar la agenda que debemos llevar a cabo.

column6: Con una voz firme y una elocuente retorica, das lo que podria ser el mejor discurso de tu vida. Alabando a tus amigos, acusando a tus enemigos y sutilmente agrandando tus virtudes, pronto tienes a la faccion entera comiendo de tu mano, aplaudiendo y gritando tu nombre.

column2: Speaking to the assembled Lords, you manage to win over most of the audience with your skillful rhetoric and even elicit some applause and cheering at the end.

column6: Hablando con los Señores reunidos, logras ganarte a la mayoría de la audiencia con tu hábil retórica e incluso provocas algunos aplausos y vítores al final.

column2: Stumbling on a word here and there, you nonetheless manage to deliver a more or less coherent speech to the assembled Lords. The applause is merely polite, but at least nobody is heckling you.

column2: Your attempts to win over the assembled Lords with your rhetoric falls on deaf ears. You stumble on phrasing, mispronounce words and forget the name of an important noble in the room. What little applause you get at the end is muted by jeers, but at least nobody is laughing.

column6: Tus intentos de ganarte a los Señores reunidos con tu retórica caen en oídos sordos. Te tropiezas con las frases, pronuncias mal las palabras y se te olvida el nombre de un noble importante en la sala. Los pocos aplausos que recibes al final son acallados por las burlas, pero al menos nadie se ríe.

column2: Mere seconds after you begin to speak to the assembled Lords, you know that things are about to go badly. column2:
My liege,
For too long, the crown has restricted our historic rights and liberties. The time has come to lower the Crown Authority! Submit to this demand peacefully or face the consequences. Rest assured that I have gathered others who are equally upset...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Durante demasiado tiempo, la corona ha restringido nuestros derechos y libertades históricos. ¡Ha llegado el momento de rebajar la Autoridad de la Corona! Sométete a esta peticion pacíficamente o afronta las consecuencias. Tenga la seguridad de que he reunido a otros que están igualmente molestos ... 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My liege,
The tribes of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have long enjoyed the freedom to do as we choose, freedoms that have been eroded far too much for our liking. The time has come to lower the Tribal Organization! Submit to this demand peacefully or face the consequences. Rest assured that I have gathered others who are as outraged over this as I...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Las tribus de [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] han disfrutado durante mucho tiempo de la libertad de hacer lo que queramos, libertades que se han erosionado demasiado para nuestro gusto. ¡Ha llegado el momento de bajar la Organización Tribal! Sométete a esta demanda pacíficamente o afronta las consecuencias. Tenga la seguridad de que he reunido a otros que están tan indignados por esto como yo ... 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My liege,
My fellow vassals hereby formally demand that the tax privilege laws be changed in our favor, as has traditionally been the case. Our rights have been eroded far too much. Submit to this demand peacefully or face the consequences.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Mis compañeros vasallos exigen formalmente que se modifiquen las leyes de privilegio fiscal a nuestro favor, como ha sido tradicionalmente el caso. Nuestros derechos se han erosionado demasiado. Sométete a esta peticion pacíficamente o enfrentate a las consecuencias. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:

column2:
My liege,
My fellow vassals believe that you personally hold far too many titles for our liking. We thus hereby demand that the [faction_demanded_title.GetFullName] be granted to [faction_demanded_title_for.GetTitledFirstName]. Submit to this demand peacefully or face the consequences.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Mis compañeros vasallos creen que personalmente tienes demasiados títulos para nuestro gusto. Por lo tanto, por la presente exigimos que el [faction_demanded_title.GetFullName] sea otorgado a [faction_demanded_title_for.GetTitledFirstName]. Sométete a esta peticion pacíficamente o enfrentate a las consecuencias. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My liege,
The tax demands placed on your feudal lords is impoverishing our realms and endangering our ability to give military service to the crown. My faction formally demands a reduction in the tax burden on all feudal lords, else drastic measured become required.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Las exigencias fiscales impuestas a sus señores feudales están empobreciendo nuestros reinos y poniendo en peligro nuestra capacidad de prestar servicio militar a la corona. Mi facción exige formalmente una reducción en la carga fiscal de todos los señores feudales, de lo contrario, se requieren medidas drásticas. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My liege,
The tax demands placed on your cities and their people is impoverishing our realms and driving honest merchants into bankruptcy. My faction formally demands a reduction in the tax burden on all cities, else drastic measured become required.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Las exigencias fiscales impuestas a sus ciudades y su gente están empobreciendo nuestros reinos y llevando a los comerciantes honestos a la bancarrota. Mi facción exige formalmente una reducción de la carga fiscal en todas las ciudades, de lo contrario, se requieren medidas drásticas. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My liege,
I see that the coffers of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] are overflowing. That wealth is due to the long support of your loyal vassals, and we hereby demand that it be shared. Ignore this reasonable demand at your peril.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Veo que las arcas de [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] están desbordadas. Esa riqueza se debe al largo apoyo de sus leales vasallos, y por la presente exigimos que se comparta. Ignore esta demanda razonable bajo su propio riesgo. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My liege,
The tax demands placed on your [From.Religion.GetName] temples is impoverishing our realm and an affront to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]. My faction formally demands a reduction in the tax burden on all temples, else drastic measured become required.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Las demandas fiscales impuestas a sus templos [From.Religion.GetName] están empobreciendo nuestro reino y una afrenta a [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Mi facción exige formalmente una reducción de la carga fiscal en todos los templos, de lo contrario, se requieren medidas drásticas. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My liege,
The succession laws of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] were recently changed, an event that has caused me and my fellow vassals much concern. We hereby demand that the laws revert to their traditional state, or else more drastic action will be taken.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Las leyes de sucesión de [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] se cambiaron recientemente, un evento que nos ha causado mucha preocupación a mis compañeros vasallos y a mí. Por la presente, exigimos que las leyes vuelvan a su estado tradicional, o de lo contrario se tomarán medidas más drásticas. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My liege,
The constant appointment and firing of councilors is creating instability and misrule at court. We formally demand a change in the laws to allow your councilors to serve for life.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
El constante nombramiento y despido de consejeros está creando inestabilidad y desgobierno en la corte. Exigimos formalmente un cambio en las leyes para permitir que sus consejeros sirvan de por vida. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:
My liege,
The levy and tax obligations placed upon your feudal vassals are too much, and exceed the power we believe the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] should wield over [Root.GetHerHis] subjects. We hereby demand that these burdens be lessened at once.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Las obligaciones fiscales y de recaudación impuestas a sus vasallos feudales son excesivas y superan el poder que creemos que [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] debería ejercer sobre sus súbditos. Por la presente, exigimos que estas cargas se reduzcan de inmediato. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2: Clearly [From.GetTitledFirstName] saw the wisdom in our demand, for [From.GetSheHe] has caved to it. Members of our faction gathered at [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] to toast our victory and brighter things to come for us all.
column6: Claramente [From.GetTitledFirstName] vio la sabiduría en nuestra peticion, porque ha cedido a ella. Los miembros de nuestra facción se reunieron en [FromFrom.Capital.GetName] para brindar por nuestra victoria y un futuro más brillante por venir para todos nosotros.

column2: It seems that [From.GetTitledFirstName] saw the wisdom in not facing down [From.GetHerHis] vassals in a civil war, for [From.GetSheHe] has caved to [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s demands. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has sent word to [FromFrom.GetHerHis] allies may stand down, and thanks you for your valued support.
column6: Parece que [From.GetTitledFirstName] vio la sabiduría de no enfrentarse a sus vasallos en una guerra civil, porque ha cedido a las demandas de [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] ha enviado un mensaje a sus aliados pueden retirarse y les agradece su valioso apoyo.

column2:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Perhaps you and your fellows have forgotten which of us is the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] and which is the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]? I spit on your demands, just as I spit upon your worthless oaths. When this war is done, all of you shall get exactly what you deserve.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Estimado [Root.GetTitledFirstName]: 
Quizá usted y sus compañeros hayan olvidado cuál de nosotros es el [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] y cuál es el [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]? Escupo tus demandas, como escupo tus inútiles juramentos. Cuando termine esta guerra, todos ustedes obtendrán exactamente lo que se merecen. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2: Then we go to war!
column3: Alors c'est la guerre!
column4: Then we must go to war!
column6: ¡Entonces es la Guerra!

column2:
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has led [FromFrom.GetHerHis] traitorous conspirators in a civil war against me. I call upon all the lords of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to stand at my side and do everything in their power to see this [GetRootFromFromInsultNounAdj] [FromFrom.GetManWoman] brought low.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

 [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] ha llevado a sus conspiradores traidores en una guerra civil contra mí. Hago un llamamiento a todos los señores de [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] para que se pongan a mi lado y hagan todo lo que esté a su alcance para ver este [GetRootFromFromInsultNounAdj] reducido. 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName ]

My liege,
Know that the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] loyally stands at your side during the civil war. Together we shall ensure that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] sees justice!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
Mi señor, 
Sepa que el [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] se mantendrá leal a su lado durante la guerra civil. ¡Juntos nos aseguraremos de llevar a [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] ante la justicia! 

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

column2:
To the [GetFromRootInsultNounAdj] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

Firmado, 
 [From.GetTitledName]

[From.GetTitledName]
